HomePage.main_text: Hello and welcome to BYOC! BYOC's mission is to reduce packaging and disposible waste. We do this by letting communities inform each other about which businesses accept Bringing Your Own Containers - and more besides. Let others know if a local coffee shop offers a discount for bringing your own cup; ask your local takeaway if they don't mind you bringing in a tupperware; see if your local supermarket will let you bag their in-store bread in your own bag! Let's help each other reduce waste!
